mapper.insert: insert into sys_user(vc_adminid, vc_name, f_age, vc_sex, vc_phone, vc_address) values (#{adminId}, #{name}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{address})
mapper.update: update sys_user set vc_name = #{name}, f_age = #{age}, vc_sex = #{sex}, vc_phone = #{phone}, vc_addresse = #{address}, vc_password = #{password}, d_update = #{updateTime} where vc_adminid = #{adminId}
mapper.select:
SELECT t.f_id id, t.vc_adminid adminId, t.vc_name name, t.f_age age, t.vc_sex sex, t.vc_phone phone, t.vc_address address, t.vc_password password, t.d_begin_date beginDate, t.d_end_date endDate, t.d_create_date createDate, t.d_update updateTime FROM sys_user t
t.vc_name like concat('%', #{ name }, '%')
and t.vc_phone like concat('%', #{ phone }, '%')
order by t.f_id desc
select * from sys_user where vc_userid = #{userid} and vc_password = #{password}
